subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Brady Hoke led the Wolverines to an 11-2 record and a Sugar Bowl win in his first season as coach, but went 20-18 over the next three years.
snippet: Brady Hoke led the Wolverines to an 11-2 record and a Sugar Bowl win in his first season as coach, but went 20-18 over the next three years.
